alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:18AM CDT until May 06 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Towanda affecting Butler County. For the Whitewater River...including Towanda, Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Augusta. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Flood waters begin to flow over Southwest 70th Street just to the east of the river bridge loacted 3 miles northwest of Augusta and also across Southwest 60th Street near the river bridge located about 4 miles northwest of town. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:31 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 23.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Whitewater River Augusta 21.0 16.8 Thu 1 am CDT 23.1 14.7 6.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
